item.title: Black manhattan
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon
  • 30 ml amaro
  • 2 dashes aromatic bitters
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

item.title: Brooklyn
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml rye whisky
  • 20 ml dry vermouth
  • 7.5 ml amaro
  • 5 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve up.
  3. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Paper plane
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20ml bourbon
  • 20ml Aperol
  • 20ml Amaro Nonino or Montenegro
  • 20ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist (or miniature paper plane).
